attributes.action: Sack all the 'professional' workers involved in the case of baby 'P' who failed in their jobs to protect him despite abuse being obvious
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to request that all those involved in the case of baby P are disciplined and sacked for failing to do their jobs correctly which resulted in the death of this little boy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
